DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The overall state of an individual's psychologic constitution._Any physical or mental impairment that interferes with an individual's ability to perform desired activities._Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person's overall psychological and emotional condition. Good mental health is a state of well-being in which a person is able to cope with everyday events, think clearly, be responsible, meet challenges, and have good relationships with others.

Concepts.definition: The overall state of an individual's psychologic constitution.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any physical or mental impairment that interferes with an individual's ability to perform desired activities.:Predetermined sets of questions used to collect data - clinical data, social status, occupational group, etc. The term is often applied to a self-completed survey instrument.

Concepts.definition: Any physical or mental impairment that interferes with an individual's ability to perform desired activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
